item.title: Car weight and MPG
item.description: Data Table This is the set of data which includes a the miles per per gallon (mpg), number of cylinders (cyl), and weights (wt) of cars a sample of cars currently on the market. ## mpg cyl wt ## Mazda RX4 21.0 6 2.620 ## Mazda RX4 Wag 21.0 6 2.875 ## Datsun 710 22.8 4 2.320 ## Hornet 4 Drive 21.4 6 3.215 ## Hornet Sportabout 18.7 8 3.440 ## Valiant 18.

item.title: First Weekend in Cape Town
item.description: #Good Morning Vietnam Not entirely sure what I want to write here but it was a good weekend these past few days. We spent Firday afternoon on a nice sunset cruise around the harbor and then got a nice dinner as well after. Saturday morning I was up early for a great day of surfing and then spent the night watching the soccer game.
